Client.gui

Class Wall

  • java.lang.Object
    • Client.gui.Wall

  • public class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
    A wall piece object in the game which consists of its location start and ending point , its lives , type ( which is smp or brk ) and lineType which means if it is horizontal or vertical .

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Wall(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String lineType)
      Generates a new wall with the given start and ending point and its type and line type .

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decreaseLives()
      Decreases the lives number of wall (Used when a bullet hits a breakable wall ) .
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
      Checks if 2 wall are the same or not.
      java.lang.String getLineType()
      Gets line type which is ver ( vertical ) or hor ( horizontal ) .
      int getLives()
      Gets the lives number of a wall .
      java.lang.String getType()
      Gets the type of a wall , which is smp ( simple ) or brk ( breakable ) .
      int getX1()
      gets the tank x1 .
      int getX2()
      Gets ending point x of wall line .
      int getY1()
      Gets starting point y1 of wall line .
      int getY2()
      Gets ending point y of wall line .
      int hashCode()
      Generates hashcode for each wall .

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        y1 - int , starting point y
        x2 - int , ending point x
        y2 - int , ending point y
        type - String , brk or smp
        lineType - string , ver or hor
